Package org.pepstock.charba.client.treemap

Contains all classes to activate the TreeMap controller (AKA chartjs-chart-treemap.js ) for CHART.js.
Author:
Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dash
    Specifies the line dash pattern used when stroking lines, using an array of values which specify alternating lengths of lines and gaps which describe the pattern.
    InternalInteraction
    Specific interaction options for treemap chart.
    InternalTooltips
    Specific tooltip options for treemap chart.
    InternalTooltips.Positioner
    Internal class to return the positioner provided out of the box by controller.
    TreeMapChart
    A treemap chart is used for displaying hierarchical data using nested rectangles.
    Treemaps display hierarchical (tree-structured) data as a set of nested rectangles.
    Each branch of the tree is given a rectangle, which is then tiled with smaller rectangles representing sub-branches.
    A leaf node's rectangle has an area proportional to a specified dimension of the data.
    When the color and size dimensions are correlated in some way with the tree structure, one can often easily see patterns that would be difficult to spot in other ways, such as whether a certain color is particularly relevant.
    A second advantage of treemaps is that, by construction, they make efficient use of space.
    TreeMapController
    Controller implementation to create treemap chart.
    TreeMapController.TreeMapControllerProvier
    Inner class which is implementing a ControllerProvider to create a treemap controller.
    TreeMapControllerResource
    Contains the content of chartjs-chart-treemap.min.js to inject.
    TreeMapDataPoint
    Used for treemap datasets.
    TreeMapDataPoint.DataObject
    Internal implementation of the object which is map the TreeMapDataPoint.Property.DATA property.
    Inside this object there is an array of original object used by the user.
    TreeMapDataset
    The treemap data set allows to specify the values for displaying hierarchical data using nested rectangles.
    TreeMapDataset.DashFactory
    Factory to create a Dash from a native array, used for array container lists.
    TreeMapDataset.DataPointFactory
    Factory to create a tree map data point from a native object, used for array container lists.
    TreeMapDataset.Font
    Object to map font options for treemap dataset configuration.
    TreeMapDataset.InternalKeyFactory
    Factory to create a keys from a native array, used for array lists.
    TreeMapExtendedChartType
    This is a fake controller in order to set it as extended chart type for treemap chart.
    TreeMapOptions
    Specific options for treemap chart.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TreeMapDataPoint.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    TreeMapDataset.Property
    Name of properties of native object.
    TreeMapDataset.TreeType
    Enumeration with all possible types of data set in the dataset.
